content.question: These two works are by the same artist. Identify the artist. Using both works, discuss ways in which the works reflect the artist’s medieval roots as well as his awareness of Italian Renaissance innovations.

frqParts.text: These two works are by the same artist. Identify the artist. Using both works, discuss ways in which the works reflect the artist’s medieval roots as well as his awareness of Italian Renaissance innovations.

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.1: Cultural Contexts of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
